alert.note: Alert for Muskingum (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 5:25PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL MUSKINGUM COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 525 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Zanesville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, Gratiot, and Dillon State Park. This includes Interstate 70 in Ohio near mile marker 143, and between mile markers 145 and 152. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
